summary.para: The SetClockDelta method adjusts the clock time.

param.name: rtDelta
param.para: Specifies the amount by which to adjust the clock, as a REFERENCE_TIME value. A positive value moves the clock forward, and a negative value moves the clock backward.

returns.para: Returns S_OK or an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The time values returned by are monotonically increasing. If you set the clock back, GetTime continues to report the old time until the internal clock catches up.

summary.para: The IAMClockAdjust interface adjusts the reference clock. The System Reference Clock exposes this interface.
